modName: City of the Gods - House Town Mod
summary: In the College of Winterhold Library lies a mysterious book called the City of the Gods. Which contains the tale of a Dragonborn named Emerant several centuries ago. The book contains a note at the end describing the location of a Portal leading to another plane of Oblivion. There you will meet Emerant, who will send you on a quest to Coldharbour,
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]dOqEcpHHoT4[/youtube]

In the College of Winterhold Library lies a mysterious book called the City of the Gods. Which contains the tale of a Dragonborn named Emerant several centuries ago. The book contains a note at the end describing the location of a Portal leading to another plane of Oblivion. There you will meet Emerant, who will send you on a quest to Coldharbour, the realm of Molag Bal to retrieve something. As a reward you will gain acces to his mansion. In this realm you will find a Blacksmith, a General store. (warning: English is not my native language) 

Dawnguard needed! 

Including: 
- Quest 
- A LONG DIARY written by Emerant the Dragonborn 
- 10 mannequins 
- 14 weapon displays 
- Many chest and storage 
- 10 bookcases 
- alchemy and enchantment table 
- Many shrines 
- A general goods shop 
- A blacksmith with everything necessary 
- Three followers (can be married) 

NPC\'s 
- Quest NPC 
- Merchant NPC 
- Blacksmith NPC 
- Three Follower NPC\'s 

This is the first version of the mod. I\'m open for suggestions and notes etc.
author: Penhoat
